title: Hiver Trial Follow Up with Bryn

signals.problem_statement: The AI sentiment analysis is inaccurately categorizing emails, leading to confusion about customer emotions.
signals.customer_ask: I did find that like we were looking at the AI kind of aspects.
signals.suggested_solution: Consider improving the accuracy of the AI sentiment analysis.
signals.context: Team size not specified, handling client inquiries during month end.

signals.problem_statement: The auto-tagging feature is incorrectly tagging emails, causing misclassification of issues.
signals.customer_ask: I found that it was doing auto tagging, but I thought I had that turned off.
signals.suggested_solution: Provide better control over the auto-tagging settings.
signals.context: Team size not specified, handling various client inquiries.

signals.problem_statement: There is a lack of clarity in the analytics reporting, specifically regarding how conversations are counted.
signals.customer_ask: I wasn't sure if you'd be able to answer about the analytics.
signals.suggested_solution: Enhance the clarity of analytics reporting to better interpret data.
signals.context: Team size not specified, sharing analytics with leadership.
